name: Your kitchen
description: The kitchen is in a frightful state. In the corner the sink is piled high with crockery in a pool of putrescent water. A number of items are strewn close at hand.

name: The garden
description: The garden is largely unmaintained. Amongst the quivering blades of your meadow are strewn parts of your unfinished time machine.

name: The University of Southampton
description: As you approach the towering edifice of the Gower building looms over you. The campus is quiet today with only a few comatose undergraduates trudging between buildings in the chill of the wind.
